title: Download installation packages
content:
Role Location
Suite administrator Bastion node

In this step, you need to download two packages from the Software Licenses and Downloads (SLD) website. 

Description Binary name
SMA suite metadata package itsma-suite-metadata-25.1-bxx.tgz
OPTIC Management Toolkit for External Kubernetes Installation and Upgrade  OMT251-xxx-15001-External-K8s.zip

To download the installation packages, follow these steps:

  1. Download the two packages to the bastion node. 
    Keep a copy of the suite metadata package on your local machine for later use.
  2. Run the following commands to unzip the OMT installation and upgrade package: 
    sudo yum install -y unzip

unzip OMT251-xxx-15001-External-K8s.zip

    The unzipped file includes the following files:

    • OMT_External_K8s_2x.x-xxx.zip
    • OMT_External_K8s_2x.x-xxx.zip.sig
  3. (Optional) Verify the OMT installation and upgrade package. Skip this step if you don't want to verify the package. 

    Visit KM000003948 to download the attached compressed tar file and get detailed steps on how to verify signatures. Unzip the downloaded file, locate the ot-package-sign.pub key and use it to verify the package.

  4. Run the following command to unzip the OMT_External_K8s_2x.x-xxx.zip file: 
    unzip OMT_External_K8s_2x.x-xxx.zip

  5. Run the following command on the bastion node to copy the jq file in the bin folder of the installation package to /usr/bin/:

    cp OMT_External_K8s_2x.x-xxx/bin/jq /usr/bin/
